name: Bastion Map
guidance: Encourage players to draw Bastion floor plans like dungeon maps.
Bastions can include closets, corridors/ramps/staircases, defensive walls, and doors/windows.
Closets and corridors are free features; defensive walls cost time and gold.
If a Bastion is fully enclosed by defensive walls, reduce by 2 the dice rolled for Bastion Defender losses during attacks.
